mapper.select: SELECT cart_id AS cartId, user_id AS userId, pro_id AS proId, cart_count AS cartCount, image_url AS imageUrl, product_info AS productInfo, quantity, shipping_fee AS shippingFee, total_price AS totalPrice, unit_price AS unitPrice FROM cart WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (user_id, pro_id, cart_count, image_url, product_info, quantity, shipping_fee, total_price, unit_price) VALUES (#{userId}, #{proId}, #{cartCount}, #{imageUrl}, #{productInfo}, #{quantity}, #{shippingFee}, #{totalPrice}, #{unitPrice})
